00045   class System {
00046   public:
00047     // must be inlined to do proper version check
00048     static inline void initialize(const String &install_directory = String()) {
00049       ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00050 
00051       if (ms_initialized)
00052         return;
00053 
00054       check_version();
00055       _init(install_directory);
00056       ms_initialized = true;
00057     }
00058 
00059     static String locate_install_dir(const char *argv0);
00060 
00061     static String install_dir;
00062     static String exe_name;
00063 
00064     static int32_t get_processor_count();
00065     static int32_t get_pid();
00066 
00067     static uint32_t rand32() { return ms_rng(); }
00068     static uint64_t rand64() { return (uint64_t)rand32() << 32 | rand32(); }
00069 
00070     // system info objects
00071     static const CpuInfo &cpu_info();
00072     static const CpuStat &cpu_stat();
00073     static const MemStat &mem_stat();
00074     static const DiskStat &disk_stat();
00075     static const OsInfo &os_info();
00076     static const SwapStat &swap_stat();
